scripts.functions:deploy:prod: bash scripts/confirm-prod.sh npx supabase functions deploy chat --no-verify-jwt --project-ref rukppthsduuvsfjynfmw
scripts.db:push:prod: bash scripts/confirm-prod.sh npx supabase db push --project-ref rukppthsduuvsfjynfmw
scripts.widget:deploy: echo y | npx supabase storage rm ss:///widget/chat-widget.js --experimental --recursive ; npx supabase storage cp widget/chat-widget.js ss:///widget/chat-widget.js --experimental
scripts.widget:deploy:prod: bash scripts/confirm-prod.sh bash -c "sed 's/wbgdpxogtpqijkqyaeke/rukppthsduuvsfjynfmw/g' widget/chat-widget.js > /tmp/chat-widget-prod.js && npx supabase link --project-ref rukppthsduuvsfjynfmw && echo y | npx supabase storage rm ss:///widget/chat-widget.js --experimental --recursive && npx supabase storage cp /tmp/chat-widget-prod.js ss:///widget/chat-widget.js --experimental && npx supabase link --project-ref wbgdpxogtpqijkqyaeke"
